title: Mausoleum of Yahya al-Shabih
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Collector's note: 36 Chabih (Mausolée) Salle du Tombeau: coté Ouest - Comité. Mausoleum of Yahyā ash-Shabiḥ.  Translation of note: 36 Shabih (Mausoleum) Room of the Tomb: West side - Committee.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
